name: recall-rumble
description: recall rumble is a game platform that allows users to play games and compete against each other's high scores.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm i && npm run build

author: Ayad, Christina, Mason, Parth and Domenico
